title: Zeits In White Satin 2/24: Fry's, Tom Morello, Julius Randle, Sheep, Blade/Spider-Man
itunes:title: Zeits In White Satin 2/24: Fry's, Tom Morello, Julius Randle, Sheep, Blade/Spider-Man
description:
On this edition of Zeits In White Satin Jack and Miles discuss the closure of unique west coast electronics department store Fry's, Tom Morello has a Sirius show on the way, Julius Randle has been popping off recently, there's an un-shorn sheep making the rounds on the internet, the new Blade will be PG-13 (boo) and the new Spider-Man title is Spide-Man: No Way Home (...boo?).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
